languages.text: "Вы нашли слова, чтоб его подбодрить. Не наказали, не напугали суровостью. Даже признали, что и сами не всесильны! Я удивилась тогда, даже посчитала это в первый миг слабостью. Но, поразмыслив, увидела в ней мудрость. То, что вы так открыто обратились к неразумному юноше, делает вам честь, Вольный Торговец".

traits.locale_text: "Вы нашли слова, чтоб его подбодрить. Не наказали, не напугали суровостью. Даже признали, что и сами не всесильны! Я удивилась тогда, даже посчитала это в первый миг слабостью. Но, поразмыслив, увидела в ней мудрость. То, что вы так открыто обратились к неразумному юноше, делает вам честь, Вольный Торговец".

languages.text: "You found the words that could comfort him. You didn't punish him, didn't scare him with a show of austerity. You even admitted that you are not all-powerful! It surprised me. I even saw it as weakness at first. But after giving it some thought, I saw the wisdom in it. The way you openly addressed the thoughtless boy does you credit, Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: "Вы нашли слова, чтоб его подбодрить. Не наказали, не напугали суровостью. Даже признали, что и сами не всесильны! Я удивилась тогда, даже посчитала это в первый миг слабостью. Но, поразмыслив, увидела в ней мудрость. То, что вы так открыто обратились к неразумному юноше, делает вам честь, Вольный Торговец".

traits.locale_text: "You found the words that could comfort him. You didn't punish him, didn't scare him with a show of austerity. You even admitted that you are not all-powerful! It surprised me back then, I even saw it as weakness at first. But after giving it some thought, I saw the wisdom in it. The way you openly addressed the senseless boy does you credit, Rogue Trader."

"You found the words that could comfort him. You didn't punish him, didn't scare him with a show of austerity. You even admitted that you are not all-powerful! It surprised me back then, I even saw it as weakness at first. But after giving it some thought, I saw the wisdom in it. The way you openly addressed the senseless boy does you credit, Rogue Trader."

"You found the words that could comfort him. You didn't punish him, didn't scare him with a show of austerity. You even admitted that you are not all-powerful! It surprised me. I even saw it as weakness at first. But after giving it some thought, I saw the wisdom in it. The way you openly addressed the thoughtless boy does you credit, Rogue Trader."

"You found the words that could comfort him. You didn't punish him, didn't scare him with a show of austerity. You even admitted that you are not all-powerful! It surprised me. I even saw it as weakness at first. But after giving it some thought, I saw the wisdom in it. The way you openly addressed the thoughtless boy does you credit, Rogue Trader."

"You found the words that could comfort him. You didn't punish him, didn't scare him with a show of austerity. You even admitted that you are not all-powerful! It surprised me. I even saw it as weakness at first. But after giving it some thought, I saw the wisdom in it. The way you openly addressed the thoughtless boy does you credit, Rogue Trader."

languages.text: “你想到了可以安慰到他的话。你并没有惩罚他，也没有通过任何惩罚性手段来吓唬他，你甚至承认了你并不是全知全能的人！你的决定让我吃了一惊。我一开始以为这是软弱的表现，但经过一番思考之后，我看到了其中的智慧。你对待那个思想不成熟的孩子的方式值得赞赏，行商浪人。”
languages.original_text: "You found the words that could comfort him. You didn't punish him, didn't scare him with a show of austerity. You even admitted that you are not all-powerful! It surprised me. I even saw it as weakness at first. But after giving it some thought, I saw the wisdom in it. The way you openly addressed the thoughtless boy does you credit, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “你想到了可以安慰到他的话。你并没有惩罚他，也没有通过任何惩罚性手段来吓唬他，你甚至承认了你并不是全知全能的人！你的决定让我吃了一惊。我一开始以为这是软弱的表现，但经过一番思考之后，我看到了其中的智慧。你对待那个思想不成熟的孩子的方式值得赞赏，行商浪人。”

languages.text: «Encontró las palabras para confortarlo. No lo castigó ni lo asustó con un despliegue de austeridad. ¡Hasta admitió que no es omnipotente! Me sorprendió. Es más, al principio me pareció una debilidad. Pero, tras pensarlo un tiempo, vi la sabiduría de sus acciones. La forma en la que trató a ese joven impulsivo le honra, Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "You found the words that could comfort him. You didn't punish him, didn't scare him with a show of austerity. You even admitted that you are not all-powerful! It surprised me. I even saw it as weakness at first. But after giving it some thought, I saw the wisdom in it. The way you openly addressed the thoughtless boy does you credit, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: «Encontró las palabras para confortarlo. No lo castigó ni lo asustó con un despliegue de austeridad. ¡Hasta admitió que no es omnipotente! Me sorprendió. Es más, al principio me pareció una debilidad. Pero, tras pensarlo un tiempo, vi la sabiduría de sus acciones. La forma en la que trató a ese joven impulsivo le honra, Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: 「あなたは彼を慰める言葉を見つけた。あなたは彼を罰することもなく、厳格さを誇示して怖がらせることもなかった。あなたは己が万能ではないとさえ認めた！正直、驚かされた。最初は弱さだとさえ思った。しかし、少し考えなおし、私はそこに知恵を見出した。思慮の浅い少年に堂々と声をかけたその態度は、称賛に値するものであると」
languages.original_text: "You found the words that could comfort him. You didn't punish him, didn't scare him with a show of austerity. You even admitted that you are not all-powerful! It surprised me. I even saw it as weakness at first. But after giving it some thought, I saw the wisdom in it. The way you openly addressed the thoughtless boy does you credit, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは彼を慰める言葉を見つけた。あなたは彼を罰することもなく、厳格さを誇示して怖がらせることもなかった。あなたは己が万能ではないとさえ認めた！正直、驚かされた。最初は弱さだとさえ思った。しかし、少し考えなおし、私はそこに知恵を見出した。思慮の浅い少年に堂々と声をかけたその態度は、称賛に値するものであると」

languages.text: "Ihr habt die richtigen Worte gefunden, um ihm Trost zu spenden. Ihr habt ihn nicht bestraft, ihn nicht durch Strenge verängstigt. Ihr habt sogar zugegeben, dass Ihr nicht allmächtig seid! Das hat mich überrascht. Anfangs hielt ich es sogar für Schwäche. Aber ich dachte darüber nach und erkannte die Weisheit darin. Wie offen Ihr zu diesem gedankenlosen Jungen gesprochen habt, gereicht Euch zur Ehre, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."
languages.original_text: "You found the words that could comfort him. You didn't punish him, didn't scare him with a show of austerity. You even admitted that you are not all-powerful! It surprised me. I even saw it as weakness at first. But after giving it some thought, I saw the wisdom in it. The way you openly addressed the thoughtless boy does you credit, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt die richtigen Worte gefunden, um ihm Trost zu spenden. Ihr habt ihn nicht bestraft, ihn nicht durch Strenge verängstigt. Ihr habt sogar zugegeben, dass Ihr nicht allmächtig seid! Das hat mich überrascht. Anfangs hielt ich es sogar für Schwäche. Aber ich dachte darüber nach und erkannte die Weisheit darin. Wie offen Ihr zu diesem gedankenlosen Jungen gesprochen habt, gereicht Euch zur Ehre, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."

languages.text: « Vous avez su trouver les mots justes pour le réconforter, au lieu de le punir ou de l'effrayer en vous montrant {mf|intransigeant|intransigeante}. Vous avez même admis que vous n'étiez pas {mf|tout-puissant|toute-puissante}, à ma grande surprise ! J'y ai vu un signe de faiblesse, au premier abord, mais après réflexion, j'ai compris la sagesse de votre réaction. La franchise avec laquelle vous vous êtes {mf|adressé|adressée} à ce garçon impertinent vous fait honneur, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "You found the words that could comfort him. You didn't punish him, didn't scare him with a show of austerity. You even admitted that you are not all-powerful! It surprised me. I even saw it as weakness at first. But after giving it some thought, I saw the wisdom in it. The way you openly addressed the thoughtless boy does you credit, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez sur trouver les mots justes pour le réconforter, au lieu de le punir ou de l'effrayer en vous montrant {mf|intransigeant|intransigeante}. Vous avez même admis que vous n'étiez pas {mf|tout-puissant|toute-puissante}, à ma grande surprise ! J'y ai vu un signe de faiblesse, au premier abord, mais après réflexion, j'ai compris la sagesse de votre réaction. La franchise avec laquelle vous vous êtes {mf|adressé|adressée} à ce garçon impertinent vous fait honneur, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: "Delikanlının yüreğine su serpecek sözcükleri buldun. Onu cezalandırmadın, güç gösterisi uğruna korkutmadın. Gücünün her şeye yetmediğini dahi kabullendin! Bu da beni gafil avladı. İlk başta zayıflık olduğunu düşündüm... Sonra üzerine kafa yordum ve davranışının ardındaki bilgeliği gördüm. O patavatsız gence hitap edişin, nasıl biri olduğunu gösterdi Hür Tacir."
languages.original_text: "You found the words that could comfort him. You didn't punish him, didn't scare him with a show of austerity. You even admitted that you are not all-powerful! It surprised me. I even saw it as weakness at first. But after giving it some thought, I saw the wisdom in it. The way you openly addressed the thoughtless boy does you credit, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Delikanlının yüreğine su serpecek sözcükleri buldun. Onu cezalandırmadın, güç gösterisi uğruna korkutmadın. Gücünün her şeye yetmediğini dahi kabullendin! Bu da beni gafil avladı. İlk başta zayıflık olduğunu düşündüm… Sonra üzerine kafa yordum ve davranışının ardındaki bilgeliği gördüm. O patavatsız gence hitap edişin, nasıl biri olduğunu gösterdi Hür Tacir."
